home.dynamicOnlineVisualizationsText: Dynamic dashboards powered by Kibana make it easy to search and analyze usage data.
home.centralizedRepositoryText: ezMESURE is a national repository centralizing the usage statistics of the digital documentation of higher education and research institutions (HEIs).
home.dataProducedByEzPAARSEText: Data are produced by the different ezPAARSE facilities in the HEIs before being aggregated in ezMESURE.

myspace.title: My Profile
myspace.noRoles: There are no roles associated with your account yet.
myspace.determineAccesRight: In order to determine your access rights, we invite you to contact the ezMESURE team or the ezMESURE correspondent in your institution.
myspace.name: Name
myspace.whatDoesRoles: These roles define your access rights to data and dashboards hosted on ezMESURE.

files.title: My Deposits
files.name: Name
files.isNotCSV: This file is not a CSV
files.markFieldIncorrectlyFormatted: Row #${lineNumber}: A field in quotes is formatted incorrectly.
files.invalidField: Line #{lineNumber}: "{field}" is not valid, has the file been modified ?
files.depositFiles: Deposit here the consultation event files that you want to load in ezMESURE. Please note that the upload is not immediate, and will be done by us as soon as possible. We invite you to read our best practice rules in order to facilitate the process, and to get in touch with the team if you wish to know more about the automation of loading. Loaded data is not accessible to other filers.

kibana.title: Kibana identifiers
kibana.newPasswordSentByEmail: A new password has been emailed to you.
kibana.resetPassword: Don't remember your password? Click on reset to receive a new one by email.
kibana.whatDoesUsername: This username allows you to connect to the Kibana interface in order to access your dashboards. To change your password, go to your Kibana account.

token.title: Authentication token
token.whatDoesToken: This token is required to use the ezMESURE API. To use it, add the following header to your HTTP requests: Authorization: Bearer {insert the token here}.
token.copyFailed: The copy of the token failed

institutions.title: Institution
institutions.notMember: You don't belong to an institution yet.
institutions.doesNotExist: The institution you are trying to access is not registered.

institution.title: My institution
institution.name: Institution name *
institution.noDataFound: Your institution's information could not be retrieved.
institution.notValidatable: Please associate a role, space and index prefix to the institution before you validate it.
institution.noAttachedDomains: There's no domain attached to this institution yet.

institutions.notAttachedToAnyInstitution: You are not attached to any institution, where you have not declared any information about your institution.
